Text:
Reporting! It seems that Zenza was surrounded and
attacked! He's been killed!

Not only was he impatient for success and took action
without using us as backup, but he had to make things
worse by splitting up forces and deploying them
one at a time...

This kind of sloppy military operation is the same as
abandoning the Goddess's protection. However, as for
the soldiers he was leading...

We will rescue those surrounded soldiers! Gather your
courage, and prepare for an attempt to break through!
B-But by now they must already beâ€•

Are you averting your eyes from those who could still
be saved?
I just...!

If you are scared for your own life, then stay here
and watch. Maybe our Goddess will embrace your
wretched fear and forgive you.

However, those soldiers isolated amongst the flames
undoubtedly hold the same fear that pierces you now.
By your will!

We never abandon ourselves to despair! Our Goddess
does not want us to attach so little importance to
life.

I will break through that wall of flames!
Follow me!
Grrraaaaaahhhhh!!!

Control your magic to narrow the targets the slime is
attacking! Stop the blow!
We have the protection of the great Goddess Beatrix!

We have the protection of the great Goddess
Beatrix!!!
...Erm...was it okay...to just let them through...?

Yeah. Drawing out a "favorite" was the goal of Lady
Alpha's strategy and exactly what she envisioned.

It sucks, but we have to leave the best fight to Lady
Alpha...

Beta, Gamma, and I all have public personas, so we
can't let any survivors escape our battles.

So Lady Alpha's idea is that we three can't fight any
battles where we could lose and survivors could
escape.
Oh... I see.

So we must work hard to eradicate every Templar
soldier from the battlefield!
Understood...
You're...
The Shadow Garden.
As I thought! Why have you opted to attack us?
Ask your heart and your memory.

You are trying to kill the possessed in the name of
the inquisition!

Purifying the possessed is nothing more than the
embodiment of the will of the Goddess Beatrix.

You dare speak of your own crimes as being the will
of a goddess!

You twisted Templars are just murdering in the name
of purification.

The Shadow Garden exists to cast the deceit of
creatures like you into the shadows!
Sorry I'm late. Is that their boss?
Yes. However, I am fine doing this alone.

Understood. Apart from holding Delta's leash, I am
done.

In that case, sweep up any nearby Templars and guard
my back.
Got it.
